author: Max Dinan
comment: Its lovely. Works well, looks great. My problem is rather specific, but I would love support for other dice (i.e. D20, D12, etc.) It would be great to use my watch for dice rolls during D&D.
title: Missing something

author: Christopher Larter
comment: Revising my review as this has been much improved.  Now supports up to 6 six sided dice, and it seems that the time for the "animation" of the dice rolling has been shortened slightly. Now usable for most board games. Good job!          Review on original version: Only supports a single six sided die, "Animation" makes it slow.  Should improve to at least support multiple six sided dice on a single roll.  Would prefer to see it support multiples of most popular die types (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12 and d20)

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Hi. Now it is possible to use multiple dice. Graphics are also updated. Please review again. Thanks.

title: Definitely improved, good app!

author: Matthew Carter
comment: It works as it should, but it should have more dice options.  It'd be nice to be able to throw in a d8 d12 and d20 into the mix.  We are wearing android, so you should already know we are way to nerdy.
title: Works as intended.

author: Jeremy Wrezinski
comment: I love the simplicity, it works just as it says.  Curious though - is there a way to "HOLD" a die (Long press to toggle)? If you could keep a die (or more) from rolling on the next roll, it would serve as a perfect tool for playing dice games like Farkel or Yahtzee.  If not, then I would HIGHLY suggest adding this functionality.  Moto 360 by the way.
title: Has a lot of potential.

author: Peter Elliot
comment: Works well. Would like to see the option to remember the last number of dice being used, as well as the ability to turn off the animation which just wastes time and power.
title: Works well. needs fast roll option.

author: Adam Politanski
comment: Would buy an addon for 1$ that allows me to roll d20 and d10, will also change review to 5 stars :)
title: Needs other dice support

author: Lee Weaver
comment: But to be really useful you need to be able to "hold" some dice while being able to roll others. Like to see this app applied to a collection of dice games including yatch, zilch and farkle.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Hi Lee, this is on the feature list for improvements. Please stay tuned. Please review again. Thanks.

title: Not bad...

author: James Bricknell
comment: I won't mark an app down for features I'd like to have. It works as advertised perfectly. Like some here I would love to see a d20 system with this too and even fudge dice.
title: Great fun.

author: Robert Maehl
comment: Would like to see multiple dice types and possibly have the dice roll by flipping the watch back away from you.
title: Works as expected

author: Opoka John Mark
comment: I installed this twice but the icon is hidden from my Smart phone. I wish this can be corrected.
title: Icon hidden

author: Tom Bowers
comment: It's OK, but give us the option to hold the dice like Yahtzee and allow to keep score.
title: OK

author: Terry. B.
comment: TONS of  Possibilities ! (or should I rephrase and say "Yats"  of possibilities ... Pun Intended.

comment: Make one for fit

comment: Works fine and was expecting less, but was impressed by the ease of use.
